flawed_nl_solution:
The season is broken up into 22/2=<<22/2=11>>11 episode based on cost
The first 11 episodes cost 11*1000=$<<11*1000=110000>>110000
The next set of episodes cost 1000*1.2=$<<1000*1.2=1200>>1200 more per episode
So they cost 1000+1200=$<<1000+1200=2200>>2200 each
So in total they cost 2200*11=$<<2200*11=24200>>24200
So in total the season cost 24200+110000=$<<24200+110000=134200>>134200
#### 134200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11000, not 110000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
